altynJuldyz.title: Altyn Juldyz
altynJuldyz.description: A group of companies in Kazakhstan, making a huge contribution to the development of various sectors of the country

comfortJagalau.title: COMFORT JAGALAU
comfortJagalau.description: We are building a multifunctional residential complex in the new center of the Almaty region in the city of Konaeva. To achieve this goal, we have assembled a professional team in the field of design, engineering and construction

advantages.title: Our advantages
items: Round-the-clock security and access control system

manufactory.title: Sewing and shoe factory
manufactory.subTitle: The largest manufacturer of workwear and safety shoes

features.title: Individual design development of workwear
features.description: As a manufacturer, we will be happy to develop an individual design of your workwear, taking into account all your wishes and in full compliance with the corporate identity and color scheme of your company. Your employees will appreciate their new uniforms.

features.title: Applying your company's logo
features.description: We will put your company's logo on the workwear or protective equipment we manufacture (thermal printing, silk-screen printing or embroidery). This everyday has a very positive impact on the image of your company and on the loyalty of your employees and staff.

values.title: Our values
values.description: To offer the product that people need, to love what they do, to do their work efficiently, to constantly improve using modern technologies, and of course, to comply with the terms of the agreement - this is the basis on which the company builds its activities. At the same time, we strictly comply with legal norms and requirements, labor and environmental protection requirements.

values.title: Responsibility
values.description: We undertake only those obligations that we can fulfill with proper quality

values.title: Quality
values.description: We always strive for high quality of our products and services

values.title: Trust
values.description: We take into account the wishes of the client and give feedback

values.title: People
values.description: Honesty towards society, partners, clients and employees of the company

career.title: Career in Altyn Juldyz
career.subtitle: Be a part of a big team!

employees.subtitle: Employees are already working with us

box.title: Be the best, strive for success
box.description: Altyn Juldyz Group of Companies is a company with 100% Kazakhstani content, engaged in various activities since 2006. Over many years of experience, we have learned to solve any business problems

projects.title: Cattle breeding farm - Lake Farm
projects.description: «Lake Farm» is a project for breeding cattle of the «Aberdeen Angus» breeding breed

projects.title: Stud farm «Altyn-Teke»
projects.description: «Altyn-Teke» is a project for breeding horses of the breeding breed «Akhal-Teke»

projects.title: Romanov Sheep breeding farm
projects.description: «Premium Lamb» is a project for breeding Romanov sheep.

projects.title: Intensive apple orchards «AtekAgro»
projects.description: «Atek Agro» produces apple trees and their long-term storage. The total area of the garden is 60 hectares, which allows you to grow 8 varieties of apples.

projects.title: The largest Trout Farm in Kazakhstan
projects.description: The farm is located at the Turgen gorge along the Turgen River. Fresh air and clean water create ideal conditions for growing healthy and delicious trout.
